category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEShowUnconfiguredOccurrencesEffectivityDefaultState
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default state of the Show Unconfigured Occurrence Effectivity button or menu option when an application is opened or a new BOM window is created. The Show Unconfigured Occurrence Effectivity button is available in the Manufacturing Process Planner and Part Planner applications. The menu option is available in Multi-Structure Manager and Structure Manager. Valid Values: true - The Show Unconfigured Occurrence Effectivity button is on. false - The Show Unconfigured Occurrence Effectivity button is off.
